'''1.84''' was an update to [[PlayStation 4 Edition]] released on December 21, 2018, to fix bugs.

== Fixes ==
; 2 issues fixed
* Fix for a crash that would could occur when loading a world or exploring an existing world.
* Fix for [[salmon]], [[pufferfish]], and [[tropical fish]] dropping [[Raw cod|cod]] when killed.
